explains: adj. 美国黑人的（等于 Aframerican）

sentences.en: It is Wagner who first demonstrated the essential fusion of racial and religious feelings in Afro-American poetry.
sentences.cn: 瓦格纳是最早将美国黑人诗歌中种族与宗教情感的融合者。

sentences.en: Yes, I decided that Tara would be Afro-American.
sentences.cn: 是的。我决意让塔拉成为一位非裔美国人。

sentences.en: Strong Afro-American woman battles huge, white opponent.
sentences.cn: 强壮的黑人妇女与庞大的白种人的战斗。
